node.display_long_description:
Think in 3D. Create in 3D.

Preserve your design intent through the creative process! Communicate ideas in 3D at each stage, capture work as an image or model to use in other phases of your workflow.

A powerful yet intuitive creation tool - express 3D ideas in real-time at any scale. Create loose free form sketches, detailed models, expansive scenes, and artwork unrestricted.

- 6 creation tools
- Geometry types: Mesh, NURBS, and SubD
- Unlimited layers
- Custom environments
- Import images, videos, and 3D files (.jpg, .png, .mp4, .obj)
- Export snapshots and 3D files (.png, .obj, .iges)
- Sync all content in the cloud using LandingPad

To enable the full Gravity Sketch experience you will need to sign up for a free landingpad.me account in order for us to deploy the features for your end-to-end workflow. LandingPad is our cloud platform allowing you to upload reference images and models, download exports and screenshots, and view your 3D files, all through a web browser.

nodes.title: Gravity Sketch's 5th Major Update!
nodes.body_text:
Introducing the latest major update to Gravity Sketch, available to all Oculus store customers from January 20th, 2021.

There has been lots of activity at Gravity Sketch in recent months, including preparing for the app going free on January 25th and an overhaul of our iPad app (sign up for the beta on our website). Development on the VR app has continued, and we’re delighted to introduce the latest major update to Gravity Sketch.

The latest version of the tool is the result of 6 months of development, and includes new features including a new lobby, subgroups, new SubD tools menu, improved stroke normal visuals, group editing and mirroring, improved object scaling, snap rotate tool, new export menu, minimap, and viewports!

These updates have all been driven by feedback that we have received from the community, and we hope these improvements will improve your experience with the tool and help further accelerate your workflows. Input from the community is vital to help drive the direction of future development of the tool, so thank you to everyone who has contributed! Please join the conversation on Discord, YouTube, and Instagram, and continue to give us all of your feedback!

node.reviewDescription:
I mostly use it for quick sketches but I have seen amazing creations on their youtube. Next I will try a bigger project. 

I saw on their instagram that they are going free on January 25th 2021. So you might want to wait if you’re not in a hurry.
node.reviewTitle: Best tool for ideation out there

developerResponse.body:
Hey - glad you're enjoying the app! When you've done your project please do share it with us on our social channels, we love to see what the community is creating!

And yes, we are going free soon! To thank you for your support you will get 'Early Adopter' status, which will give you some additional perks, and don't worry, you'll obviously keep all your features. There's more details on our blog if you haven't found that already!
